item.title: Stuck
item.dc:creator: @meatstick meatstick
item.description:
@meatstick wrote:

[quote=“Jessekinss, post:3, topic:311358”]byte[] chatMessage = DataConversions.stringToByteArray(s);
sendChatMessage(chatMessage, chatMessage.length);
s = DataConversions.byteToString(chatMessage, 0, chatMessage.length);

I’m guessing its;

String a = DataConversions.byteToString(messageData, 0, messageData.length);

Well you can close this if I’m right.[/quote]
The RSC client uses it’s own method to turn a String into a bytearray and bytearray into a String, not the original byte[] b = “hello”.getBytes() if you’re wondering.

Read full topic
